website_summaries.verdict: These feature three levels of absorbency and an innovative design that goes the extra mile to help combat leaks.
pros: Unique to this tampon is the LeakGuard braided string, which works to actively channel leaks back into the core
Enhanced with FormFit protection for a personalized fit that's comfortable and less likely to leak
Smooth plastic applicator with a non-slip grip makes it easy to insert
Thoughtfully designed with a smooth removal layer for reduced discomfort during changes even on the lightest days
cons: When it comes to design, it's not the most compact

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but cotton gets loose
customer_reviews.text: They work alright. I don't like how pieces of the cotton come apart from the actual tampon though, upon removal. It concerns me that there are loose particles left behind which could result in an infection. But there was very minimal leaking, on days where other products clearly were not up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Confetti6

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The only brand of tampons I buy. Great for light and/or heavy periods. Provides adequate protection and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Demi Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Stop the flow
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, different sizes for changing flows, easy and smooth insertion, and visually appealing and inconspicuous to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Deaunna13

customer_reviews.title: A necessity
customer_reviews.text: I like using this brand but I wish they used applicators that were more eco friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Vander Plaats

customer_reviews.title: They are good and plastic applicator is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: They are good and plastic applicator is easy to use. I remember however the times when applicators were made of paper and work similar. May be that was more ecological.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivery is a mess
customer_reviews.text: Tampax are a great brand, but I wasn’t impressed with it being delivered in an envelope and crushed flat when it arrived. All the tampons are spilled out and the box is unusable, which is a pain for storage. Very disappointed because I don’t have the budget to get more if these are cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Every girl needs them
customer_reviews.text: They’re tampons... do I really need to leave a review
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Thank You!!  You made giving easy :)
customer_reviews.text: Sent these to the water protectors at Standing Rock. They were much appreciated!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Reliable as always!!🙃
customer_reviews.text: Reliable as always!! And great to have them delivered without the hassle of unloading your car!!😬
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I keep trying different brands hoping to save a few pennies.... I Always come back to this product.
customer_reviews.author: TrinitySage84

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bulk buying is the best way to go. I love Amazon prime
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: This is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I expected and came exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No complaints these things shoot right up there and do what they are supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This box is good, but the super absorbency tampax pocket pearl is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Bats

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety and decent price and if you're lazy like me - get it delivered
customer_reviews.text: Ladies gotta do what a ladies gotta do. Load up on these bad boys. They're like a step above cardboard, so when I feel like splurging I get a box or 3.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to stay stocked on this necessary item at a low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schiffer

customer_reviews.title: Going back to this design
customer_reviews.text: Recently, Ive tried the tampax pockets, but it was a HUGE disappointment ! I ended up going back to these ones, which work perfectly. Why mess with success, right?? Tampax - I’ve been using your brand for over 35 years, and this is your best design so far. This is the winning product. Don’t change it please.
customer_reviews.author: Gili abro

customer_reviews.title: Great multi pack
customer_reviews.text: Great multi pack. The lite tampons are great for those early days on the cycle and the end. The super works great for night time and on heavy days. And regular is my go-to. All three are color coded but in case you forget they are also labeled with "L" "R" "S" Smooth applicator and all units come safely sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tampons are great as always! But the packaging is terrible for distinguishing between sizes
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: It is even better that I don't have to go to the store ...
customer_reviews.text: These have always been my go to due to comfort. It is even better that I don't have to go to the store every month!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I love prime pantry
customer_reviews.text: I love prime pantry! That said these were not for me however, no complaints about the product from those that use it.
customer_reviews.author: SybilWar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, would buy again! so very soft and the quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Shelden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite tampons by far. All the sizes to fit your needs!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Change the colors of the wrappers
customer_reviews.text: Make all the wrapper colors look obviously different. Too hard to tell the sizes apart when they are all mixed together in the combo pack. They are all basically the same color.
customer_reviews.author: FenderKitty

product_meta.title: Tampax Pearl Plastic Tampons, Mutlipack, Light/Regular/Super Absorbency, Unscented, 47 Count (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Get protection and comfort every time! Only Tampax has a unique LeakGuard Braid that helps stop leaks by channeling them back into the core, giving you ultimate protection, even on your heaviest days. The Smooth Removal Layer gives you amazing comfort, even on your lightest days. Insertion of the tampon is always easy and comfortable with the smooth Pearl applicator. FormFit protection helps close the gaps that can cause leaks, giving you up to 8 hours of protection. Plus, this Triplepack of tampons has three levels of absorbency, so you're protected from your lighter days through your heavier ones. Feel confident with Tampax Pearl, knowing that you get protection and comfort all day.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
P&G Plaza, Cincinnati, OH 45202




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :3.78 x 6.89 x 5.79 inches; 9.6 Ounces
 * Date First Available :April 22, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Procter & Gamble
 * ASIN :B00J4YWX94

feature_bullets: LeakGuard Braid helps stop leaks before they happen
Smooth Removal Layer gives you amazing comfort, even on your lighter days
Smooth, rounded-tip applicator and Anti-Slip Grip for comfortable insertion
Tampax Pearl tampons give you up to 8 hours of comfortable, leak-free protection
FormFit protection gently expands to fit your unique shape
